pr_title: Add support for MaxConcurrentActivityExecutionSize for async activities

timeline.message: Add support for MaxConcurrentActivityExecutionSize for async activities
do note invoke completion handle on heartbeat

timeline.bodyText: I don't think you want to complete on a heartbeat.
timeline.author: mfateev
mfateev

timeline.bodyText: Make this method and other methods thread safe. It looks like doNotComplete on return should be also made thread safe.
timeline.author: mfateev

timeline.bodyText: Why? it makes perfect sense for local activities implemented asynchronously.
timeline.author: mfateev

replies.bodyText: We need to rethink our behavior for limiting local activity throughput as currently semaphore and setMaxConcurrentActivityExecutionSize is only applied to normal activities. Also I don't think we support async local activities in principle. This would be a bigger change, and I suggest keep it out of scope for this PR.
replies.author: vitarb

replies.bodyText:
Let's keep it out of the scope of this PR.
I believe that async local activities can be an important performance optimization in some cases.
replies.author: mfateev

timeline.message: Use synchronization in async APIs in the context
